H0.text: Who wrote the 1911 opera ‘Der Rosenkavalier’. Gustav Mahler

H1.text: Who wrote the 1911 opera ‘Der Rosenkavalier’. Alban Berg

H2.text: Who wrote the 1911 opera ‘Der Rosenkavalier’. Franz Schreker

H3.text: Who wrote the 1911 opera ‘Der Rosenkavalier’. Richard Strauss

A4.text: his opera Der Rosenkavalier is generally considered his finest achievement

A5.text: he created with the librettist and poet Hugo von Hofmannsthal. These operas included Elektra (1909), Der Rosenkavalier (1911)
